text: Kanchi Natarajan Gandhi (born 1948) is a botanist and curator. This author is usually abbreviated «Gandhi» when citing a botanical name. ==Taxa named by Gandhi== File:Sophora_secundiflora_flower.jpg|he christianized frijolito as Dermatophyllum Piptochaetium fuscum Barworth, Cialdella et GandhiRodriguez et al 2018 Catalogo Category:Living people Category:1948 births Category:American botanists Category:Harvard University faculty
title: Kanchi Natarajan Gandhi
